welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tegucigalpa, the vibrant capital of Honduras! Get ready to be enchanted by its rich history, colorful markets, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer."

restaurants.name: TacoMexi
restaurants.description: TacoMexi is a mexican restaurant located in Tegucigalpa.
restaurants.address: Barrio La Plazuela (Av. Paz Barahona), Tegucigalpa, Francisco Morazán

restaurants.name: NicoLati's
restaurants.description: NicoLati's is a café located in Tegucigalpa.
restaurants.address: Paseo Liquidambar (Centro De La Capital), Tegucigalpa, Francisco Morazán Dept

restaurants.name: Café Paradiso
restaurants.description: Café Paradiso is a café located in Tegucigalpa.
restaurants.address: Barrio La Plazuela (No. 1351), Tegucigalpa, Francisco Morazán

restaurants.name: Pisco
restaurants.description: Pisco is a peruvian restaurant located in Tegucigalpa.
restaurants.address: Col. Palmira (Paseo Republica de Argentina), Tegucigalpa, Francisco Morazán

restaurants.name: Sushi Bar
restaurants.description: Sushi Bar is a sushi restaurant located in Tegucigalpa.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toncontin Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Toncontin Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
